channel.title: Need Help REP++
channel.description: Hi i need help i just added new crowns and... admins and owner have the same crown is there anyway i can make them have different and also how do i remove the white part behind the crowns here are some pictures. add my skype if you can help please skype: Dylan.Avocodo [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2cp47cy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/rtdk5w.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @Dylan123321 Dylan123321
item.description:
@Dylan123321 wrote:

that kid is making the background transparent not the image

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @Haydnz1234 Haydnz1234
item.description:
@Haydnz1234 wrote:

To change the white background, get a good software such as Photoshop (can get cracks for it) and save it via that but MAKE SURE YOU SET BACKGROUND TO TRANSPARENT! I’m not so sure about the same badge thing, maybe make a custom rank like rank 7 and make it that image? Here’s how to make a picture transparent using Photoshop:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GQ0GWa0SCJo[/youtube]

Read full topic
